function Calender(props){ const { day, dayNo, month, year }= props.date(); const dayOWeek= ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday']; function getDaysInMonth(year, month) { return (new Date(year, month, 0).getDate()); } alert(getDaysInMonth(2022, 6)) var dt = new Date(`${month+1}/17/${year}`); // return(
